actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the purchase and construction of railroad rolling stock by persons other then common carriers.

summary.text: Allows an amortization deduction for income tax purposes to all taxpayers under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 for the purchase and construction of railroad rolling stock (presently limited to taxpayers who are common carriers).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the purchase and construction of railroad rolling stock by persons other then common carriers.
